item.description:
Dear New Member,

This Open Rehearsal is a Casting Call for all prospective improvisers for the Laughing Matter improvisational comedy drama troupe. If volunteer improvisation appeals to you, and you wish to explore the possibility of cast membership, please come!

During this rehearsal, we will run through a variety of warmups, drills, and improv games that will introduce new members to a typical format of Laughing Matter rehearsals. This rehearsal will also serve as a preliminary component to the Ensemble B audition process.

If you possess any previous improv, drama, or performing arts experience, you are strongly encouraged to attend. Your fit as an improviser will be sorted out in due course.

I look forward to meeting all of you. Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions.

Best regards,
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Open Rehearsal - Ensemble B Casting Call 1
